function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for major external disruptions within the supply chain","Impact":"Decreased organizational performance and productivity","Mitigation":"Developing a robust risk management strategy and diversifying sourcing and distribution channels","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, real-time monitoring systems","People":"Organizations within the supply chain","Owner":"Supply chain managers, risk management teams"},{"Description":"Lack of adoption of knowledge-based systems for training and knowledge management","Impact":"Decreased expertise and knowledge retention within the organization","Mitigation":"Implementation of knowledge management systems and training programs","Technologies":"Knowledge management software, e-learning platforms","People":"Employees within the organization","Owner":"Human resources, training departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate performance evaluation for long-term sustainability","Impact":"Reduced ability to adapt to major disruptions and uncertainty","Mitigation":"Implementing comprehensive performance evaluation frameworks for sustainability","Technologies":"Supply chain analytics, sustainability assessment tools","People":"Supply chain managers, sustainability teams","Owner":"Management, sustainability officers"}]}
